title: PTI policies to bring development, prosperity: Buzdar
content:
LAHORE, Jan 16 (APP):Punjab Chief Minister Usman Buzdar has said that following the government policies, year 2020 would bring more development and prosperity to the province and the country at large.
He said that the government had never compromised on its commitment towards public service despite a spate of criticism.
In a statement issued here, Usman Buzdar said the government was continuing to perform and serve masses while the opposition had been busy in slogan-mongering. The PTI government was striving for transforming Pakistan into a true welfare state, he added.
He regretted that even fundamental needs of people were ignored and resources were wasted on exhibitory projects in the past. The incumbent government has set a new example by introducing holistic reforms and attention has been focused on provision of facilities to the general public.
